mapper.select: select i_seq, i_url, i_rgb1, i_rgb2, i_rgb3, i_rgb4, i_rgb5 from t_interior order by i_seq Limit 12 Offset #{pageCount}
select count(*) from t_interior where i_rgb1 = '142, 132, 115'
select pl_seq, pl_c1, pl_c2, pl_c3, pl_c4, pl_c5 from t_palette where m_email = #{m_email};

select * from t_color
where #{c_seq} between 1 and 10
where #{c_seq} between 11 and 20
where #{c_seq} between 21 and 30
where #{c_seq} between 31 and 40
where #{c_seq} between 41 and 50
where #{c_seq} between 51 and 60
where #{c_seq} between 61 and 70
where #{c_seq} between 71 and 80
where #{c_seq} between 81 and 90
where #{c_seq} between 91 and 100
where #{c_seq} between 101 and 110
where #{c_seq} between 111 and 120
where #{c_seq} between 121 and 130
where #{c_seq} between 131 and 140
where #{c_seq} between 141 and 150
where #{c_seq} between 151 and 160
where #{c_seq} between 161 and 170
where #{c_seq} between 171 and 180
where #{c_seq} between 181 and 190
where #{c_seq} between 191 and 200
where #{c_seq} between 201 and 210
where #{c_seq} between 211 and 220
where #{c_seq} between 221 and 230
where #{c_seq} between 231 and 240
where #{c_seq} between 241 and 250
where #{c_seq} between 251 and 260
where #{c_seq} between 261 and 270
where #{c_seq} between 271 and 280
where #{c_seq} between 281 and 290
where #{c_seq} between 291 and 300

select c_seq, c_rgb, c_name from t_color where c_seq = 5 or c_seq = 15 or c_seq = 25 or c_seq = 35 or c_seq = 45 or c_seq = 55 or c_seq = 65 or c_seq = 75 or c_seq = 85 or c_seq = 95 or c_seq = 105 or c_seq = 115 or c_seq = 125 or c_seq = 135 or c_seq = 145 or c_seq = 155 or c_seq = 165 or c_seq = 175 or c_seq = 185 or c_seq = 195 or c_seq = 205 or c_seq = 215 or c_seq = 225 or c_seq = 235 or c_seq = 245 or c_seq = 255 or c_seq = 265 or c_seq = 275 or c_seq = 281 or c_seq = 300
select i_seq, i_url, i_rgb1, i_rgb2, i_rgb3, i_rgb4, i_rgb5 from t_interior
